language.name.description: enter the name of your language like speakers would like to see it

search.noSearchResults.message: No books in the library match the search {searchString}

level.none.message: Books that don't have a level
level.none.description: Used to label books which are missing level information.

level.none.collection.description: Used to label books in a particular collection which are missing level information. For example, "COVID-19 - Missing level" as opposed to "COVID-19 - Level 1".

level.prefix.description: This is shown before either 'first words' or 'first sentences', 'longer paragraphs', etc. We avoid calling it a 'Reading level' because that term suggest more than we're doing here. This is a really simple measure just based on counting words, sentences, and paragraphs.

level.automated-measure-notice.description: This notice is appended when we show a book 'level' that hasn't been set by a human, but rather by a simple calculation, which may be wrong.

noLanguageMatch.message: We could not find any book with languages matching {searchString}

error.pageNotFound.message: We can't seem to find the page you're looking for.

error.cantFind.message: Sorry, we could not find that book.

book.detail.getBloomReader.description: Text of the Bloom Reader download link

book.detail.getTemplateButton.getThis.description: Get in the sense of start a process to download it.

book.detail.getTemplateButton.download.message: The template book will be downloaded and installed. You can start a book with this template, or add any of its template pages from the "Add Page" dialog box from any book.

book.detail.draftDescription.message: Show this book only to reviewers with whom I share the URL of this page.
book.detail.draftDescription.description: Label for a check box which, if checked, marks the book as 'DRAFT' and prevents the book from showing in most views

book.missingFontsNotice.message: We cannot fully present this book because it uses one or more fonts that BloomLibrary.org does not have. Please help us to find each font by clicking on its name and answering some questions:

book.harvesterTakingTooLongNotice.message: We apologize for the inconvenience, but our server seems to be having problems processing newly uploaded books.

book.harvesterSoonNotice.message: This book has recently arrived in the Bloom Library and should be processed soon. Please check back in a few minutes.

book.harvesterFailedNotice.message: Our server encountered a problem while processing this book. The developers have been notified.

book.artifacts.visibility.new.message: Our system has not yet generated this format.

book.artifacts.visibility.fail.message: Our system ran into a problem while trying to generate this format.

book.artifacts.visibility.userHidden.message: This format has been hidden by the person who uploaded this book.

book.artifacts.visibility.librarianHidde.message: This format has been hidden by a site moderator.

book.artifacts.visibility.scaling.message: Our system was not confident about scaling the book to this format.

book.artifacts.bloompub.message: Download BloomPUB for Bloom Reader or BloomPub Viewer

book.repliesWillBeSent.message: Replies will be sent to the email address you provided when you signed up:

book.concerns.message: What concerns do you have about this book?

book.share.description: If clicked, the user will get an interface to share the book on social media (initially Facebook)

toUseThisSignIn.description: Your translation should contain two slashes. The text between the slashes will become a button or hot link for signing in.
toUseThisSignIn.message: To use this function, please /Sign In to Bloom Library/

delete.book.confirm.message.message: If you continue, this version of the book {title} will be removed from BloomLibrary.org. There is no way to undo this except by uploading it again.

language.unknown.description: Heading in a list of languages for a collection of books that have a particular feature, but we don't know which language(s) actually support the feature

downloadShellbook.aboutToDownload.headin.description: Heading for the download shellbook dialog. Indicates that the download is about to start after one more step.

downloadShellbook.aboutToDownload.messag.message: You are about to download {bookTitle} into the Bloom Desktop Application. You need to have <link>Bloom</link> already installed on your computer.
downloadShellbook.aboutToDownload.messag.description: {bookTitle} will be replaced by the title of the book being downloaded. The text inside <link></link> will be a link to the downloads page of the Bloom library website.

downloadShellbook.aboutToDownload.dontSh.message: I get it. Don't show me this again.
downloadShellbook.aboutToDownload.dontSh.description: Label for a check box which, if checked, prevents the extra dialog from appearing before downloading a shellbook.

downloadShellbook.downloading.header.description: Heading for the download shellbook dialog. Indicates that the download should be happening now.

downloadShellbook.downloading.message.message: Bloom should run, download the book, and allow you to add it to your collection.

downloadShellbook.tryAgain.description: Text for a button on the download shellbook dialog.

download.beta.description: Text for a button to download the beta version of the Bloom software.

download.versionInfo.description: Describes the version of the Bloom software to be downloaded. "versionNumber" is the version number of Bloom, e.g. 4.8.3. "date" is the date that version was created, e.g. 2020-11-24.
